text:
[Verse]
Twilight skies above us
Raindrops on our skin
Dance into the rhythm
Let the night begin

[Verse 2]
Puddles splash around us
Laughter fills the air
Magic in the moment
Love is everywhere

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Crazy in the night
Feeling so alive
Everything's alright

[Verse 3]
Streetlights shine so brightly
Guiding us along
Whispering our secrets
While we sing our song

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Crazy in the night
Feeling so alive
Everything's alright

[Bridge]
We’ll forget tomorrow
Hold each other close
Swaying with the thunder
Where the heart knows
title: Dancing in the Rain
